Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Crowne Plaza Changi Airport places you in the heart of Singapore, convenient to Changi Chapel Museum and Changi Museum. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Changi Beach Park and Changi Business Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 320 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional amenities include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and shopping on site.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. A stay at Crowne Plaza Changi Airport places you in the heart of Singapore, convenient to Changi Chapel Museum and Changi Museum. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Changi Beach Park and Changi Business Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Changi Chapel Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Changi Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Changi Beach Park - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Changi Business Park - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Changi Point Ferry Terminal - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Singapore Expo - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Wild Wild Wet Theme Park - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Escape Theme Park - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
East Coast Park - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Tanjung Puteri Golf Resort - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Geylang Serai New Market - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Parkway Parade - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Singapore National Stadium - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Marina Bay Golf Course - 15 km / 9.3 mi
Malay Heritage Centre - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Changi Airport is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for a maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to the hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
